Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 111st overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1980...
Injured on 8/21/1983 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/2/1985, off Amanda Whurlitzer (MAN)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Capital City on 7/27/1986 (Going to PG: 1B J. Diaz. Going to CC: LF C. Weir, P H. Shope)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/10/1987, off Michael Feist (PG)...
Injured on 8/27/1989 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/8/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $519,800 per year...
